alert.note: Alert for Butts; Greene; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 12:46AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morgan, northwestern Putnam, northern Monroe, northwestern Greene, Butts, northwestern Jones, Jasper, southeastern Newton and northern Lamar Counties through 115 AM EST... At 1246 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Madison to near Turtle Cove to Milner, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Jackson, Madison, Forsyth, Monticello, Rutledge, Newborn, Flovilla, Milner, Mansfield, Woodville, Shady Dale, Buckhead, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Worthville, Wrayswood, Greshamville, Central Georgia Experiment Stn and Blount. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Greene; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam
